column10:
1) The team discusses their attack against the Daimyo Yabu
2) Takuma urges them to take action because he wants revenge
3) Mugen decides that an attack on Yabu's mansion is justified
4) The plan is to either aprehend or kill Yabu before he escapes
5) Mugen and Aiko will report to the Shogun
6) Hayato, Yuki and Takuma will face Yabu
The team plans their next move in the meeting place.
EN
column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: Safe House
column12: 藏身处

column10: So he took that cannon blast and it only cost him a leg? Got to say, I'm impressed. What is he doing now?
column12: 挨了一炮，只丢了条腿？真是命大啊。现在他在做什么?

column10: We supplied him with tools and materials. He has been working in his chamber ever since.
column12: 我们给琢磨大师提供了工具和材料。之后他就一直在工作室里忙碌着。

column10: He seemed willing to enter the Shogun's services. How does he plan to compensate for his … disability?
column12: 虽然他很热心为将军效劳。但腿部的残疾……要如何克服呢？

column10: We will know soon enough. How was your scouting mission, Hayato-san?
column12: 很快就知道了。隼人兄，侦察的情况如何？

column10: We had a look Lord Yabu's mansion. Big place, heavily guarded. It's closed off by a wall, but Yuki found a way inside.
column12: 我们探查了薮大名的宅邸。地方很大，重兵把守，外有围墙。但友希还是发现了进去的路。

column10: That sounds promising. Speaking of whom, where is Yuki-chan?
column12: 看来有戏。话说，友希小妹去哪了？

column10: Here, master samurai!
column12: 我来了，武士大哥。

column10: Hehe, I must say Mugen, your young companion is full of curiosity.
column12: 哈哈，无限啊，你的这个小伙伴，好奇心可不小哇。

column10: Good to see you, old man.
column12: 很高兴再见到你，老爷子。

column10: Ah, the young Shinobi. Hayato, is it? Good to see you too.
column12: 哦，这小伙不是忍者隼人么？我也很高兴见到你。

column10: Takuma-san. Are you ready for the field?
column12: 琢磨大师，准备好出战了吗？

column10: A bit rusty maybe.
column12: 嗯…就是身体还有点僵。

column9: feels the weight of the backpack
column10: Everything weighs less in my memory.
column12: 毕竟体力不如从前了。

column9: Yuki goes to Tanuki and  plays with it.
column10: Then, let us discuss strategy.
column12: 那么，来一起讨论计划吧。

column10: Lord Yabu's guilt is proven. He might only be allied with Kage-sama, but I believe he is the man himself.
column12: 薮大名的罪行已经坐实。虽然他也可能只是同党，但我感觉他就是影大人。

column10: Only one way to find out. If we want to get to him we better move now.
column12: 要知道真相，只有一种方法。要抓他的话，最好现在就行动。

column10: No doubt he will see us coming. It will be the most dangerous mission yet.
column12: 他一定早有提防了。这次可能是目前为止最为危险的任务。

column9: puts a box on the table
column10: Hmm, then we must be prepared. Here. I made one for each of you.
column12: 嗯！那就更要做好万全准备。拿着，我给你们每人做了一把。

column9: takes a gun from the box
column10: Matchlock pistols? Never seen one so small ... not too shabby, old man.
column12: 火绳枪吗？我还没见过这么小的…手艺不错嘛，老爷子。

column9: puts a box on the table
column10: A last resort for desperate times. My first contribution. Heh, may Yabu's downfall be the next.
column12: 这个可以当成紧急关头的最后手段，也算是我报解救之恩了。呵呵，希望我的下次贡献就是亲手干掉薮贼。

column10: Guess I'll come with you then. You'll need all the help you can get.
column12: 那我还是和你一起去吧。这事一个人办不了。

column10: I want to come too!
column12: 我也要去。

column10: I appreciate your support.
column12: 谢谢，感激不尽。

column10: Very well. You have my blessings to do whatever is necessary. I, shall travel to Edo. The Shogun will want to know of our plan.
column12: 很好。祝你们旗开得胜。我要前往江户，向将军禀报情况。

column10: Then I will accompany you. It has been long since we enjoyed a peaceful moment together.
column12: 我也一起去。你我二人已经很久没能一起享受片刻宁静了。

column9: Mugen and Aiko leave the room
column10: I would be honoured, Aiko-san. Let us prepare for the journey.
column12: 那太好了，爱子小姐。我们去收拾行装准备出发吧。

column10: So, the three of us against a powerful daimyo in his heavily guarded mansion. I've had worse odds.
column12: 也就是说，我们区区三人要去对付藏在重兵把守的府邸里的大名么。嗯…比这更难的我也干过。

column10: Some things there want to be taken. But we won't come for things. We'll come for Lord Yabu!
column12: 那边也有很多物件想被偷走呢。不过这次不偷东西了，直接对付薮大名！

column10: Hmm ... a mercenary, a cripple and a child. They will tell stories about this one, hehehe.
column12: 嗯...一个是拿钱办事的，一个是瘸子，再加上一个小孩。这次可有好戏看了，呵呵呵。

column10: MISSION-WORDCOUNT EN:
